snippet.title: Bones Beneath - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST now on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2874550/Bones_Beneath/

FOLLOW us on TWITTER: @BlueHerbSoft

Explore the Egyptian underworld in this precision platformer! Jump, whip, and dash your way through a challenging, interconnected world that weaves linear gauntlets with open-ended exploration.

#indiegame #platformer #steam #pixelart #8bit #nes #retrogames #indiedev #pcgaming
